body.p: The purpose of the JSON schema is to define the legal properties and values of a JSON document to keep it valid and well formed. When editing JSON Schema, all of the same features in the JSON editor are available.

includes a new document template to help you get started creating a JSON Schema document. The template is called JSON Schema and it can be found in the New Document folder in the New document wizardNew from templates wizard. You can also customize your own JSON Schema templates and specify other versions (draft 04, 06, or 07).
